title: [Bug] Incorrect Level on OCE Boards
body: As the title states, the level of my account displayed by the fora for NA and OCE differ; NA displays the (as of now) correct 14, whilst OCE displays my level as 1. This is not just a visual bug - I am unable to post on the OCE forums.

replies.body: Hey Anondylar, I have fixed your account on the OCE boards. In the future, you can submit a support ticket and our PS team will help you!

Dear Bear Hat Alice  ,

How is the firewall issue doing? Any news please? 

Waiting for reply
Thanks

Well, I did try to do that, but I was unable to figure out exactly out how I could do that in Support. There were only various articles on unrelated problems, an "ask a question" area... No place to submit a support ticket though. Exactly where do I go to do that?
The "Ask A Question" area is what you want!
